title: I have been troubled by a sinus condition
header: I have been troubled by a sinus condition
meta_content: J. suffered a sinus condition for years until they learned that Jesus bore all sickness and disease on the cross for us
content:
I have been troubled by a sinus condition for years. After learning that Jesus bore all sickness and disease on the cross for us, I have been standing on that Word. On Sunday, Pastor Tom had a word that came forth that someone needed a manifestation for their healing in the sinus area. I went up, and praise God, I was healed. I received my manifestation and was set free! J.
Reno, NV
